targets.expr:
max_over_time(
  label_replace(
    DLC_sensors_gauge{
      metric=~"CPU[0-9]+ temperature"},
    "cpu_name",
    "$1",               
    "metric",
    "(.*) temperature") 
  [24h:])

100 *
label_replace(
  DLC_sensors_gauge{
    description="byte",
    metric=~"H200NVL_[0-9]+' current memory usage",
    server_name="dg5W"
  },
  "gpu_name", "$1",                      
  "metric", "(H200NVL_[0-9]+') .*"
)
/
on(server_name, gpu_name)
label_replace(
  DLC_sensors_gauge{
    description="byte",
    metric=~"H200NVL_[0-9]+' memory capacity",
    server_name="dg5W"
  },
  "gpu_name", "$1",
  "metric", "(H200NVL_[0-9]+') .*"
)

100 *
label_replace(
  DLC_sensors_gauge{
    description="byte",
    metric=~"H200NVL_[0-9]+' current memory usage",
    server_name="dg5W"
  },
  "gpu_name", "$1",                      
  "metric", "(H200NVL_[0-9]+') .*"
)
/
on(server_name, gpu_name)
label_replace(
  DLC_sensors_gauge{
    description="byte",
    metric=~"H200NVL_[0-9]+' memory capacity",
    server_name="dg5W"
  },
  "gpu_name", "$1",
  "metric", "(H200NVL_[0-9]+') .*"
)
